events.title: Marseille vs Nantes - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 17
events.desc: Marseille have won eight of their last 10 Ligue 1 matches against Nantes, as many wins as they managed in their previous 27 encounters. This is their longest unbeaten run against FCN in their history. Marseille have won their last five Ligue 1 home games against Nantes, scoring at least two goals each time. They have also scored in their last 11 home meetings with FCN in the competition.

events.title: Rayo Vallecano vs Mallorca - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 19
events.desc: Rayo Vallecano have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Mallorca, failing to score in the last two. Rayo Vallecano have only failed to score in three consecutive meetings against Mallorca in the competition once before, back in 2002. Mallorca have only lost 28% of their away games against Rayo Vallecano in LaLiga, their lowest away defeat percentage against a single opponent they have faced at least five times in the top-flight.
